Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Implement the company’s website style guide specs for the layout, overall appearance, and usability.
              
              •	Interface directly with the marketing team and content manager to maintain consistent brand representation.
              
              •	Create prototypes for design concepts, mock-ups, and approved designs.
              
              •	Continually validate designs for usability.
              
              •	Maintain / update website pages as needed.
              
              •	Ensure content is proofed and utilize appropriate QA processes.
              
              •	Translate complex information into simple design / logical interfaces and flows / navigation.
              
              •	Utilize new tools and technologies to improve interface experience.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	3+ years of experience in a Web Design/Graphic Design position
              
              •	Design with the best possible user experience in mind
              
              •	Proficient in Photoshop and other Adobe Creative Suite Software
              
              •	Proficient in CSS and HTML
              
              •	Creative versatility, able to work well in a variety of design styles
              
              •	Up to date on current web design & technology trends
              
              •	Good communication skills – be able to express your ideas visually and verbally to clients and to the internal team
              
              •	A positive attitude and a healthy sense of humor are a must
              
              ---
              
              BENEFITS AND COMPENSATIONS
              

              ♣	Salary: $1,000 to $3,000/ month
              
              ♣	Working time: 8h/ days, 5 days/ week
              
              ♣	Bonus: 1-10 months salary depend on performance
              
              ♣	Annual leave
              
              ♣	Lunch box support, annual medical check-up, weekly sport activities, monthly teambuilding, yearly vacation, …
              
              ♣	Working environment: international, flexible, creative, young and beautiful office
              
              ♣	Having chances to rotated working in other branches such as Singapore, Taiwan, Australia, India, Indonesia when job needs
              
              ♣	Working with foreign experts, foreign colleagues from Germany, France, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, …
              
              ♣	Experiences: 0 – 3 years
              
              ♣	Graduated: from top University is preferred
              
              ♣	Good mindset and good attitude, hard-working, responsible
              
              ♣      Supporting Devices: Phone & Laptop
              
              ♣     Working: Maple Tree Business Centre, District 7, HCMC
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
